name: MLCSoftmaxLayer
desc: A layer that outputs a probability distribution as attention weights.

items.name: init(operation: MLCSoftmaxOperation)
items.desc: Creates a softmax layer with the operation you specify.

items.name: init(operation: MLCSoftmaxOperation, dimension: Int)
items.desc: Creates a softmax layer with the operation and dimension you specify.

items.name: var dimension: Int
items.desc: The dimension over which you want to perform the softmax operation.
